availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky-born farmer. Residence: Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Ghent, p. 15.

Find A Grave, Entry for Samuel Howard (1798-1876), Find A Grave Memorial # 22884545, Ghent Masonic Cemetery, Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=HOW&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=4681&GRid=22884545& (accessed 11 May 2017).
